name: Living Soot
description: The Living Soot is a large elemental creature defined by its chaotic and hazardous nature, resembling a tangled mass of blackened, dusty webbing that can effortlessly glide through the air.
memorable: Its ability to engulf opponents in toxic fumes and create choking ash storms makes it a formidable presence on the battlefield.
goals: It usually aims to control the battlefield by hindering opponents and dealing damage through its toxic effects.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other elemental creatures or in environments heavily infused with soot and ash.
environment: Commonly found in areas rich in soot and ash, such as volcanic regions or burnt landscapes.
strengths: The Living Soot is immune to fire and poison damage, allowing it to endure longer in combat.
weaknesses: It has a vulnerability to cold damage, which can impair its mobility and defenses significantly.
attacks: It can make two powerful Slam attacks or grapple with its Constrict attack, dealing substantial bludgeoning and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Engulfing Sootstorm, which spreads poisonous ash in a wide radius, dealing significant damage and halving opponents’ speed.
skills: It has average perception abilities with a passive perception of 10.
additional_information: Can partially freeze when exposed to cold damage, reducing speed and AC temporarily.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its elemental nature.
Can move through narrow spaces without squeezing.
Can disguise itself by remaining motionless as a web-like mass.
Causes damage and breathing restrictions when entering a hostile creature's space.
